compare.sql: SELECT * FROM OPENQUERY(CUBE, 'select {[Date].[CY 2005], [Date].[CY 2006] , [Date].[CY 2007]} on rows, [Measures].[Internet Sales Amount] on columns from [Adventure Works]');
